snippet: The Obama administration will tell the United Nations that it will observe a treaty to restrict cruel treatment of detainees in some places abroad.
abstract: Obama administration is expected to unveil new interpretation of United Nations treaty ban on cruel treatment, saying it will restrict how the United States may treat prisoners in certain places abroad; interpretation marks shift from disputed Bush administration theory that the cruelty ban does not apply abroad.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration will tell the United Nations that it will observe a treaty to restrict cruel treatment of detainees in some places abroad.

headline.main: U.S. to Revise Bush Policy on Treatment of Prisoners
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Revise Bush Policy on Treatment of Prisoners
